newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Planters Bank declares cash dividend.
newsitem.headline: Planters Bank declares cash dividend.

text.p: Planters Development Bank said on Tuesday its board had approved a cash dividend of 11.2752 pesos per share for Class C preferred shareholders as of March 31, 1997.
In an advisory to the Philippine Stock Exchange, the bank said the cash dividend will be payable on April 7, 1997.
